description.english: Collect all the collectibles

description.english: Transport all ancient frogs

description.brazilian: Transporte todos os sapos antigos

description.english: Transport the giant ancient frog to the crystal room
description.german: Transportiere den riesigen alten Frosch zum Kristallzimmer
description.french: Transportez la grenouille ancienne géante dans la salle de cristal
description.spanish: Transporta la rana antigua gigante a la sala de cristal.

description.portuguese: Transporta o sapo gigante antigo para a sala de cristal
description.brazilian: Transporte o sapo gigante antigo para a sala cristal

description.bulgarian: Транспортирайте гигантската древна жаба до кристалната стая.
description.schinese: 将巨型远古青蛙传送到水晶屋
description.polish: Przenieś olbrzymią starożytną żabę do kryształowej komnaty

description.bulgarian: Транспортирайте огнената древна жаба до кристалната стая.

description.polish: Przenieś lawową starożytną żabę do kryształowej komnaty

description.polish: Przenieś odwróconą starożytną żabę do kryształowej komnaty

displayName.english: You Maniacs! You blew it up!

description.brazilian: Encontre a rosa

displayName.french: Vous ne savez pas faire l'omelette
displayName.bulgarian: На бас, че не можете да направите омлет

description.english: Crush at least 10 different types of creatures
description.german: Zerstöre mindestens zehn verschiedene Arten von Kreaturen
description.french: Écrasez au moins 10 créatures différentes
description.italian: Schiaccia almeno 10 tipi diversi di creature
description.spanish: Aplasta al menos a 10 tipos de criaturas.
description.portuguese: Esmaga pelo menos 10 tipos de criaturas diferentes
description.brazilian: Esmague pelo menos 10 tipos diferentes de criaturas
description.bulgarian: Смачкайте поне десет различни типа същества.
description.schinese: 至少压碎 10 种不同的生物

description.english: Zap at least 6 types of creatures
description.german: Röste mindestens sechs verschiedene Arten von Kreaturen
description.french: Électrocutez au moins 6 types de créatures
description.spanish: Electrocuta al menos a 6 tipos de criaturas.
description.italian: Fulmina almeno 6 tipi diversi di creature
description.portuguese: Atinge pelo menos 6 tipos de criaturas
description.brazilian: Fulmine pelo menos 6 tipos de criaturas
description.russian: Тряхните током минимум 6 различных типов созданий.
description.schinese: 至少打败 6 种不同的生物

description.english: View at least 7 of the island's main attractions from a bird's-eye view
description.german: Sieh dir mindestens sieben der Hauptattraktionen der Insel aus der Vogelperspektive an
description.french: Observez au moins 7 des principales attractions de l'île depuis les airs
description.spanish: Observa al menos 7 atracciones principales de la isla a vista de pájaro.
description.italian: Osserva almeno 7 delle attrazioni principali dell'isola dalla visuale a volo d'uccello
description.dutch: Bekijk minimaal 7 hoofdattracties van het eiland van bovenaf
description.portuguese: Vê pelo menos 7 das principais atrações da ilha de uma perspetiva aérea
description.brazilian: Visite pelo menos 7 atrações principais da ilha em modo vista aérea
description.russian: Просмотрите минимум 7 достопримечательностей острова с высоты птичьего полета.
description.bulgarian: Разгледайте поне седем от основните забележителности на острова от причи поглед.
description.schinese: 至少鸟瞰浏览岛上的 7 个主要景点
description.polish: Obejrzyj z lotu ptaka co najmniej 7 z głównych atrakcji wyspy

description.english: Make two raged porcupines collide with each other
description.german: Lasse zwei wütende Stachelschweine miteinander kollidieren
description.french: Provoquez une collision entre deux porcs-épics enragés
description.spanish: Haz que dos puercoespines furiosos colisionen entre ellos.
description.italian: Fai in modo che due istrici da lancio sbattano l'uno contro l'altro
description.dutch: Laat twee woedende stekelvarkens tegen elkaar botsen
description.portuguese: Faz dois porcos-espinhos furiosos colidirem
description.brazilian: Faça dois porcos-espinho brabos colidirem
description.russian: Заставьте двух разъяренных дикобразов столкнуться друг с другом.
description.bulgarian: Накарайте две гневни таралежчета да се сблъскат един в друг.
description.schinese: 让两头发怒的豪猪相互碰撞
description.polish: Spraw, aby dwa rozwścieczone Jeżozwierze zderzyły się

displayName.portuguese: Agora estás a pensar com galinhas

description.english: Get stuck in an infinite warp loop
description.german: Bleibe in der unendlichen Zeitschleife hängen
description.french: Retrouvez-vous coincé dans une boucle de téléportation sans fin
description.spanish: Queda atrapado en un bucle infinito.
description.italian: Resta bloccato in un ciclo di teletrasporti infinito
description.dutch: Kom vast te zitten in een oneindige tijdsprong
description.portuguese: Fica preso num ciclo de warp infinito
description.brazilian: Fique preso num looping infinito
description.russian: Застряньте в бесконечном цикле переходов через варп.

description.english: Let the bats kill all creatures in that one cave in the water mountain
description.german: Lasse die Fledermäuse alle Kreaturen in dieser einen Höhle im Wasserberg beseitigen
description.french: Laissez les chauves-souris tuer toutes les créatures de la grotte de la montagne
description.spanish: Deja que los murciélagos maten todas las criaturas de la cueva de la montaña del agua.
description.italian: Lascia che i pipistrelli uccidano tutte le creature nella caverna della montagna d'acqua
description.dutch: Laat de vleermuizen alle wezens in de grot van de waterberg afmaken
description.portuguese: Deixa os morcegos matarem todas as criaturas naquela caverna da montanha de água
description.brazilian: Deixe os morcegos matarem todas as criatura na caverna da montanha d´água
description.russian: Позвольте летучим мышам убить все создания в пещере в водяной горе.
description.bulgarian: Позволете на прилепите да унищожат всички същества в планината от вода на пещерата.
description.schinese: 让蝙蝠杀死水山洞穴中的所有生物
description.polish: Spraw, aby nietoperze zabiły wszystkie stworzenia w pewnej jaskini w wodnej górze

description.english: Transport all ancient frogs without visiting the city
description.german: Transportiere alle alten Frösche, ohne die Stadt zu besuchen
description.french: Transportez toutes les grenouilles anciennes sans visiter la ville
description.spanish: Transporta todas las ranas antiguas sin pasar por la ciudad.
description.italian: Trasporta tutte la rane antiche senza visitare la città
description.dutch: Vervoer alle oeroude kikkers zonder de stad te bezoeken
description.portuguese: Transporta todos os Sapos Antigos sem visitar a cidade
description.brazilian: Transporte todos os sapos antigo sem visitar a cidade
description.russian: Перевезите всех древних жаб, не посетив город.
description.bulgarian: Транспортирайте всички древни жаби без да навлизате в града.
description.schinese: 不经过城市传送所有远古青蛙
description.polish: Przenieś wszystkie starożytne żaby, nie odwiedzając miasta

description.english: Photograph a ghost
description.french: Photographiez un fantôme
description.spanish: Haz una foto a un fantasma.
description.italian: Fotografa un fantasma
description.dutch: Maak een foto van een spook
description.portuguese: Fotografa um fantasma
description.brazilian: Fotografe um fantasma

description.english: Lavaaaaaargh!
description.french: De la lave !!!
description.spanish: ¡Lavaaaaaa!
description.italian: Lavaaaaaargh!
description.portuguese: Lavaaaaaargh!
description.brazilian: Lavaaaaaaaaa!

description.english: Scoop up a jumping Berrybug with a Hermitcrab
description.german: Fange einen springenden Beerenkäfer mit einem Einsiedlerkrebs
description.french: Recueillez une groseille sauteuse avec un bernard-l'ermite
description.spanish: Haz que un bichobaya salte sobre un cangrejo ermitaño.
description.italian: Piazza un paguro sotto una pulce che sta saltando!
description.dutch: Pak een springende besbeestje met een hermietkrab
description.portuguese: Apanha uma Berrybug saltadora com um Hermitcrab
description.brazilian: Colete um Roxinho saltante com um Caranguejo
description.russian: Подтолкните прыгающего ягодожука вверх с помощью рака-отшельника.
description.schinese: 使用借居蟹接住一只跳跃的浆果臭虫

description.english: Make a Berrybug jump up in a bubble
description.german: Lasse einen Beerenkäfer in ein Bläschen springen
description.french: Faites sauter une groseille dans une bulle
description.spanish: Haz que un bichobaya salte en una burbuja.
description.italian: Fai saltare una pulce in una bolla
description.dutch: Laat een besbeestje in een bubbel springen
description.portuguese: faz uma Berrybug saltar para uma bolha
description.brazilian: Faça um Roxinho pular na bolha
description.bulgarian: Накарайте Берибъг да скочи към мехур.
description.schinese: 让浆果臭虫跳入一个泡泡
description.polish: Spraw, żeby Jagodorobaczek wskoczył do bańki

description.english: Escape a collapsing bridge
description.french: Évitez de justesse un pont qui s'écroule
description.spanish: Escapa de un puente que se derrumba.
description.italian: Fuggi da un ponte che crolla
description.portuguese: Escapa de uma ponte a cair
description.brazilian: Escape da ponte que cai
description.bulgarian: Изплъзнете се от срутването на мост.

description.english: Call the map bird but don't let it pick you up
description.german: Rufe den Kartenvogel, aber lass dich nicht mitnehmen
description.french: Appelez l'oiseau géant mais ne le laissez pas vous prendre
description.spanish: Llama al pájaro mapa pero no dejes que te recoja.
description.italian: Richiama un pennuto viaggiatore senza farti prendere
description.dutch: Roep de kaartvogel maar laat hem je niet ophalen
description.portuguese: Chama o pássaro do mapa, mas não o deixes apanhar-te
description.brazilian: Chame o pássaro-mapa mas não o deixe pegá-lo
description.russian: Вызовите большую птицу, но не позвольте ей поднять вас.
description.bulgarian: Извикайте птицата, но не ѝ позволявайте да ви грабне.
description.schinese: 召唤地图鸟，但是不要让它接你
description.polish: Wezwij ptaka mapowego, ale nie daj się mu złapać

description.english: Catch a frog in its own bubble
description.german: Fange einen Frosch in seinem eigenen Bläschen
description.french: Attrapez une grenouille dans sa propre bulle
description.spanish: Caza a una rana en su propia burbuja.
description.italian: Cattura una rana nella sua stessa bolla
description.dutch: Vang een kikker in zijn eigen bubbel
description.portuguese: Apanha um sapo na sua própria bolha
description.brazilian: Pegue um sapo em sua própria bolha
description.russian: Поймайте жабу в ее собственный пузырь.
description.bulgarian: Хванете жаба в собствения си балон.
description.schinese: 抓住一只藏在自己的泡泡里的青蛙
description.polish: Złap żabę w bańkę, którą sama wypuściła

description.english: Whistle SOS

description.italian: Fischietta S.O.S.
description.portuguese: Assobia S.O.S.
description.brazilian: Assobie um SOS

description.english: Get rid of all the birds in the tiny ancient frog level
description.german: Beseitige alle Vögel auf dem Level des winzigen alten Froschs
description.french: Débarrassez-vous de tous les oiseaux du niveau de la grenouille ancienne minuscule
description.spanish: Deshazte de todos los pájaros en el nivel de la rana antigua pequeña.
description.italian: Sbarazzati di tutti gli uccelli nel livello dell'antica rana minuscola
description.dutch: Verwijder alle vogels in het level van het oeroude kikkertje
description.portuguese: Livra-te de todos os pássaros do nível do sapo antigo minúsculo
description.brazilian: Livre-se de todos os pássaro no nível do sapinho antigo
description.russian: Избавьтесь от всех птиц на уровне с крохотной древней жабой.
description.bulgarian: Оттървете се от всички птици в нивото с малката древна жаба.
description.schinese: 摆脱迷你远古青蛙关卡的所有小鸟
description.polish: Pozbądź się wszystkich ptaków na poziomie z malutką starożytną żabą
